title: Crunch Time for Wout van Aert Ahead of Flanders-Roubaix Crucible: ‘I Have to Do it for Myself’
content:
Wednesday's Dwars door Vlaanderen is one more chance to blow out the cobwebs as pressure piles on injury-depleted Visma-Lease a Bike: 'I've done everything I can to get ready for the classics.'

Read the full article at Crunch Time for Wout van Aert Ahead of Flanders-Roubaix Crucible: ‘I Have to Do it for Myself’ on Velo.
author: ahood
